name: Gates of R'lyeh
description:
Play as an eldritch horror defending yourself from heroes!

Build unique towers with the blood of your foes. Extend your tentacles to create more real estate for your towers. Turn the tables with your devastating laser attack. 

How long can you survive?

Ooze tower 
Rapidly shoots gooey projectiles at enemies.Smack tower
Slams the ground with a tentacle, dealing AoE damage to enemies.

Very effective on groups of farmers.Chomp tower 
Insta-kills most enemies by eating them, but has a long cooldown. 

Very effective on single, high-health enemies. Farmer
10 HP
Average speed
Low damageWizard
40 HP
Very fast
(Can dodge attacks)
Medium damageKnight

High damageDark Knight
250 HP

Featuring 3 different towers, 4 unique enemy types, and 20 hand-crafted rounds of enemies.
